value.name: Traumatized Utah tailor sues police after hail of gunfire destroyed shop
value.description: The driver, Harold Vincent Robinson, had just led police on a car chase through the Salt Lake Valley. Fifteen officers from three police agencies opened fire on Robinson. Dozens and dozens of ...

value.name: Suspect dead after robberies, wild police chase in Salt Lake City
value.description: A string of armed robberies followed by a shootout and a wild police chase through Salt Lake City concluded in a hail of bullets that left the suspect, 37-year-old Harold Vincent Robinson ...
